	Project:
	Bon BonBox

	Role:
	Developer

	Description:
	BonBox processes and sends orders directly to partner restaurants, which then deliver to their customers. The service is available via Web applications. Customers order food by entering their pincodes on the App and browsing for food from a list of restaurants. They can create meals by browsing restaurant menus and selecting items they want to order before entering an address and proceeding to the checkout.The application also provides feature like a user can add a product to the shopping cart by dragging the item into the shopping cart. Restaurants receive these orders and then deliver to customers. BonBox sends out an SMS to confirm orders and their estimated delivery time. Developed HTTP Server for the BonBox, which includes:

 Vendor, user and delivery boy registration.
Creating dynamic Menus items.
Searching menu items and vendors based on recommender system.
Tracking delivery boy using "traccar" GPS API by sending the location using external GPS module.
Authenticating the user with auth0.
Sending sms of the order status to both vendor and user.

	Creating Web based Api’s , Database Architecture, Bug Fixing

	Environment:
	Dropwizard, Rethink-DB, Traccar, Msg91, Caddy, Places API.

	Description:
	IDRAK is a mobile and web based application intended for online readers. It would make searching, viewing and selection of e-pub documents/books easier for user's specific to their needs. User can also bookmark the selected topics in a specific book.



	Responsibilities:
	Creating Web API’s , Creating Admin panel to store eBooks.

	Environment:
	NodeJS, Dust, MongoDB, Auth0
